body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. play Riku of Two Reflections
2. play Gaea's Anthem
3. play Miming Slime, copying it (resulting in a 3/3 token and a 4/4 token, both get +1/+1 from Gaea's Anthem, so, it's save to say: Miming Slime works well)
4. cast Progenitor Mimic, choosing a Miming Slime Ooze token - which results in a 0/0 token (getting +1/+1 from Gaea's Anthem) What is the expected output? What do you see instead? http://gatherer.wizards.com/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=369001 "If the chosen creature is a token, Progenitor Mimic copies the original characteristics of that token as stated by the effect that put it onto the battlefield. Copying a token doesn't make Progenitor Mimic become a token."

Since the X/X does not come from any mana cost, X should be the power of the creature with the highest power. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? If you are reporting a game play bug, please attach your game.log file. If you are reporting a crash, please attach both crash.log and game.log files (both files are found in the main game folder). Please provide any additional information below.
author: [Landhotel.Westerwald](https://code.google.com/u/Landhotel.Westerwald/)
title: Copying a Miming Slime token with Progenitor Mimic results in a 0/0 Copy
